title.rendered: Oribe Power Drops – Everything You Need To Know

content.rendered:
If you’re like us, and you’ve got at least half the Oribe Collection stacked on your bathroom shelves, you know everything they do is pretty amazing. And now, your cult favourite, is releasing a revolutionary line that is set to change your #hairgame.

Introducing…Oribe Power Drops

Inspired by skin care customisation, Power Drops are three revolutionary highly-concentrated hair serums that can be mixed with any Oribe hair product or used on their own. They allow you to personalise your routine and target your specific hair needs, including hydration and environmental protection, colour preservation and damage repair.

Want to be one of the first to get your hands on Oribe Power Drops? Order Online and we will have it sent out to you! Not sure which Power Drops are best suited for you? Contact Us for a complimentary consultation.

Hydration & Anti-Pollution Booster

This highly concentrated treatment serum provides an intense dose of deep hydration and defends against environmental pollution. Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid, Creatine and Moringa seed extract, just a few drops of this elixir delivers powerful protection and profound conditioning.

Key Benefits

  • Deeply hydrates by drawing in moisture and sealing it into the cuticle
  • Creates a protective barrier against free radicals and moisture loss
  • Shields hair from dryness, oxidative stress and cuticle damage caused by air pollutants
  • Enhances softness while restoring manageability
  • Can be mixed with any Oribe hair products

Colour Preservation Booster

This highly concentrated treatment serum provides an intense dose of antioxidants and amino acids to shield hair from UV rays and enhance color retention. Formulated with vitamin C, bioflavonoids and quinoa protein, just a few drops of this powerful elixir preserves and protects every shade.

Key Benefits

  • High concentration of antioxidants preserve hair colour by defending against environmental oxidation which can fade and shift colour
  • Enhances colour retention by creating a barrier to protect strands
  • Shields hair from UV rays to maintain colour vibrancy
  • Conditions and increases shine for healthier hair
  • Can be mixed with any Oribe hair products

Damage Repair Booster

This highly concentrated treatment serum provides an intense dose of essential nutrients to rebuild and restore dry, damaged, time-weakened hair. Formulated with linoleic acid, biotin and sea kelp extract, just a few drops of this powerful elixir repairs and fortifies strands.

Key Benefits

  • Helps reserve damage by reviving the natural manageability of dry, time-weakened strands
  • Repairs and strengthens to increase resistance to environmental stressors
  • Reduces hair fall due to breakage while restoring elasticity
  • Improves hair health and combability by smoothing the cuticle to enhance softness
  • Can be mixed with any Oribe hair products
